attributes.title: i’m ded
attributes.review: the app sent me to an alternate dimension and i got punched by space neuro transmitter particles then fell into platinum vortex and sucked out the atmosphere the kicked back to earth and landed in the middle of a dessert and got eaten by a HUGE land turtle then it climbed to the top of  Mount Everest and spit me out all the way to CHinA 👌🏽 and i had to walk run and swim all the way back to my house in america. OH and don’t forget this took 100 years since i got sent to an alternate dimension and also i just hate trump and i’m contributing to getting his app removed ☺️❤️

attributes.title: Scary
attributes.review: I got this app because I heard from my cat that it was cursed. I decided to try it out. And my cat was indeed correct. After about only an hour of it being downloaded I decided to take a nap. When I woke up I saw it. A terrifying Cheeto man in my corner. I was absolutely terrified I close my eyes and when I opened them again he was gone. I immediately deleted the app. But what happened will always haunt me. I can still hear the faint, terrifying words of, “make America great again.” And I shutter every time

attributes.title: complicated and difficult
attributes.review: This app here took several days to download. I wanted to check out what was happening but once I got it, this app interfered with my others app sending notifications. I think the opening of the app is messed up or broken. It says “Keep America Great”. That statement does not seem accurate so I don’t trust the entirety of the app based off the opening. The app layout was very weird and not simple. It was complicated to go through the app and glitched a lot.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: so i downloaded this to support our lovely 💖𝓹𝓻𝓮𝓼𝓲𝓭𝓮𝓷𝓽💖 and it took a week to download. i was kinda frustrated so i opened the app and then my screen went black. then a picture of our beautiful handsome orange popped up and scared me badly. then my phone started vibrating and exploded. then my bed caught on fire and eventually my entire house burned to the ground. i’m now living on the streets thanks to trump and i’m writing this off of a flip phone. and i can’t get a job because then you’d need a housing address and as you know now, trump burned my house down ❤️. then on the streets i was raped by a cop and the justice system also won’t charge him. i was so upset so i went to visit my mother’s grave and started hearing trump whispering telling me to do racist and sexist things. overall would not recommend. 😡

attributes.title: If I could I would rate it 0
attributes.review: First of all why is this ugly orange Cheeto have #1 in news apps, screw that why does he have an app. The fact that a celebrity tv star who lives off his daddy’s money is president is sad and all he does is tweet stuff is atrocious. Plus, him and his racist republican supporters are dumb ESPECIALLY Fox News. But the app crashed my phone and made it freeze causing me to have to factory reset it and messed up my audio. This app is spam and keep having apps. Apple should IMMEDIATELY remove this app!!! 😠 #removethisapp

attributes.title: boo!!!!!
attributes.review: it took me almost trumps whole election to finally download this app! And another month before I could actually see anything in the app! by then, trump almost got kicked out of office :). Anywho, this app made me had nightmares because white and orange rats were everywhere on my screen with weird names like pence?!. Next thing I know, blood starts running down the screen- probably for a “vote red” campaigning thing. anyway, this app deserves to be kicked off of the AppStore and handed to the Oompa Loompas for them to eat!

attributes.title: Terrible App 👹
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app so I could support our wonderful, non racist, non rapist, non peadophilic, non misogynistic president. BUT I was shocked that when I fist opened the app is said KEEP AMERICA GREAT. Sis read the room we are in the middle of a pandemic and huge economic crisis, America is not doing well sweetie🧚‍♀️✨. Then it asked for my phone number!!! I’m sweetie isn’t the president married🤬🤬🤬🤬!!!! Isn’t he married to Melania ‘green card’ Trump????? So I deleted the app, but now I’m 𝓼𝓬𝓪𝓻𝓮𝓭. If this man becomes president again I will be 𝓲𝓷𝓽𝓮𝓻𝓿𝓲𝓷𝓲𝓷𝓰💞💖. 🧚‍♀️✨ 

Anyways... stan Bernie ✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I would never get this app again. The service was so low and it constantly crashed, it also broke my phone and I had to take it to the Apple store👁👄👁. I expected better. It drains your battery like a waterfall, I went from 100% to 0% in 2 minutes 🤢🤢🤢🤧. It is also run by a fascist who I hope to never see become president😱😱😱. Also it took up so much space with lies, I mean like I was exhausted after seeing all the lies, it really screwed up my sleep schedule.

attributes.title: He gave me ptsd
attributes.review: I the nicest citzen opened the app and looked around it was horrifying orange small wewe having trunp With his fake hair on his head. I couldnt go anywhere without seeing his hair. Its like he hypnotized me. I feel disgusting with a lump in the back of my throat. I can’t describe the pain I feel. And he had the audacity to put hateful things about us if we didn’t answer the surveys to his likings.i now have ptsd I can’t go anywhere think about anything without put it triggering me. -10/10 wouldn’t recommend

attributes.title: My heart has been shattered 😭
attributes.review: my love for our all mighty ompaloompa is through the roof, so i knew i just had to get his app. when i downloaded it i started getting A BUNCH OF PIMPLESSSSSS. i knew this was crazy because i watch skincarebyhyram so it had to be because of this cursed app. i deleted it and my skin was CLEAR AGAIN ✨. i had no choice but to put an end to my love for donald for the sake of my skin. it was very difficult but my skin has been better than ever. if you want to have clear skin don’t get this app.
